name: Solo Leveling Workspace
postAttachCommand: chmod +x .devcontainer/cleanup.sh && .devcontainer/cleanup.sh && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get upgrade -y && python3 -m venv .venv && source .venv/bin/activate && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get upgrade -y && sudo apt-get install -y libpoppler-cpp-dev && pip3 install --upgrade pip && pip3 install -r requirements.txt && git add . && git commit -m 'Update dependencies' && git push
